publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Isaiah 15
ab.l: Navilik Moʾav üč́uń ki keč́a byla talanyr ʿAr Moʾav kesilir ki keč́a byla talanyr Qir Moʾav kesilir.
Baryr Moʾav ol juv́ǵa da Divon ol bamotḥa jylamaḥ byla Ńevo üč́uń da Ḿed́evar üč́uń Moʾav syjyt ėt́ar bar bašlary čyzuvlu da bar saɣal jylmalanɣan bolur.
Oramlarynda bajlanyrlar kijiź čardaḥlary üś- t́uńa da oramlarynda barysy syjyt ėt́ar ėt́ar jylamaḥ byla.
Da firjat ėt́ar Ḥešbon da ʾĖlʿale Jahacḥa d́ejiń ėšitilir avazlary anyn üč́uń suvurɣanlary Moʾavnyn syjyt ėt́arĺar ǯany syjyt ėt́ar öźu üč́uń.

Ajtyr ulus juŕagim Moʾav üč́uń firjat ėt́a- dir qačḥynčlary anyn Coʾarɣa d́ejiń kip buzov kibik üč́ jašar ki keĺu- v́u sary ol luḥytnyn jylamaḥ byla baryr anyn ašyra ki jolu sary Ḥoronajimniń firjatym synyḥlyḥnyn syjyt ėt́arĺar.
Ki suvlary Nimriniń v́eŕań bolurlar ki qurur ḱoǵut́ upranyr jašot ḱoǵut́ jesiĺlik bolmastyr anar.
Anyn üč́uń ki ḱop mal qyldy da mallaryn qyryjy üśt́uńa öźaniniń ol tallyḥlarnyn ėĺtir alarny dušman.
Ki quršar ol firjat č́egiń Moʾavnyn Ėglajimǵa d́ejiń syjyt ėt́ar da B́eʾer Ėlimǵa bolur syjyty anyn.
Ki suvlary Dimonnun tolarlar qandan ki qojarmyn Dimon üśt́uńa üśt́amḿagiń qanly iš́ĺarniń qutulmaɣy- na Moʾavnyn bolur aryslan da qaldyɣyna jeriniń Moʾavnyn.
